title: GET_VEHICLE_LOCK_ON_TARGET
content:
0x4A557117// GetVehicleLockOnTarget
Vehicle GET_VEHICLE_LOCK_ON_TARGET(Vehicle vehicle);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle to check.Returns: The vehicle that is locked on. 0 returned if no vehicle is locked on.Gets the vehicle that is locked on to for the specified vehicle.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for GET_VEHICLE_LOCK_ON_TARGET
GetVehicleLockOnTarget(vehicle)
